name: Space Huggers
description: My JS13K game is a run and gun roguelike in 13KB of JavaScript! How to Play: Use WASD or D-Pad to move. Left click or Z to shoot, most things will break, some will catch fire. Middle click or X to roll, brief invulnerability, does damage, gives a boost, and puts out fire. Right click or C to throw a grenade, 3 per life. Or use a gamepad and connect up to 4 controllers for local co-op play! Full screen mode recommended. JS13K entry: https://js13kgames.com/entries/space-huggers 🚀
